nodes.bodyText: Shall we make  "method_not_found6.bal" a local variable?

We can use a String formatter to plug in values for the method name and the  type instead of repeating it multipe time?
String formatter =                 "{ballerina/java}METHOD_NOT_FOUND 'No such public method '%s' that " +
                        "matches with parameter types " +
                        "'(%s)' " +
                        "found in class 'class org.ballerinalang.nativeimpl.jvm.tests.StaticMethods''"
